original_text: People in all the Israelite tribes were quarrelling with each other. They were saying, ‘King David saved us from the power of the Philistines and all our other enemies. But now Absalom has chased him out of our land.
korean_text: 이스라엘 모든 지파 백성들이 변론하여 이르되 왕이 우리를 원수의 손에서 구원하여 내셨고 또 우리를 블레셋 사람들의 손에서 구원하셨으나 이제 압살롬을 피하여 그 땅에서 나가셨고

sentences.original_text: People in all the Israelite tribes were quarrelling with each other
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 모든 지파의 사람들이 서로 다투고 있었다

sentences.original_text: from the power of the Philistines
But now Absalom has chased him out
